data.title: Genealogy of the Imperial and Royal Family of Austria
data.text:
Genealogy of the Imperial and Royal Family of Austria-Hungary1

HI & RH Archduke Karl Ludwig and his descendants

HI & RH Karl Ludwig Joseph Maria Prince Imperial and Archduke of Austria, Prince Royal of Hungary and Bohemia

* Schlo� Sch�nbrunn, Vienna, July 30th, 1833

 Vienna, May 19th, 1896

Heir Pressumptive to the Throne of Austria-Hungary, January 30th, 1889

Married:

Dresden, November 4th, 1856:

HRH Margaretha Karoline Friederike Cecilie Auguste Amalie Josephine Elisabeth Maria Johanna Princess of Saxony

* Dresden, May 24th, 1840

 Villa Reale, Monza, September 15th, 1858

(by proxy) Aula delle Prospettive, Royal Palace of the Quirinale, Rome, October 16th and (in person) Chapel, Palace, Venice, October 21st, 1862:

HRH Maria Annunziata Isabella Filomena Sabasia Princess of the Two Sicilies ("Golla")

* Caserta, March 24th, 1843

 Erzherzogliches Palais, Favoritenstra�e, Vienna-Wieden, May 4th, 1871

Schlo� Kleinheubach near Miltenberg, July 23rd, 1873:

HRH Dona Maria Teresa de Imaculada Concei��o Fernanda Eul�lia Leopoldina Adelaide Isabel Carolina Micaela Rafaela Gabriela Francisca de Assis e de Paula Gonzaga In�s Sofie Bartolomea dos Anjos Infanta of Portugal

* Schlo� Kleinheubach near Miltenberg, August 24th, 1855

 Vienna, February 12th, 1944

 Munich, March 10th, 1915

Renounced his right of succession and assumed the surname Burg, February 6th, 1911

Married:

(morganatic) Bisch�fliche Kapelle des heiligen Lucius, Chur, August 25th, 1909:

Heir Pressumptive to the Throne of W�rttemberg, October 16th, 1917

Head of the Royal Family of W�rttemberg, October 2nd, 1921

 Vaduz, April 8th, 1961

 Vaduz, March 13th, 1960

Married:

HSH Aloys Gonzaga Maria Adolf Prince von und zu Liechtenstein

(Renounced his right of succession in favour of his son: February 26th, 1921)

HI & RH Otto Franz Joseph Karl Ludwig Maria Prince Imperial and Archduke of Austria, Prince Royal of Hungary and Bohemia ("Bolla")

* Graz, April 21st, 1865

 Vienna-D�bling, November 1st, 1906

Married:

Katholische Hofkirche zur Heilige Dreieinigkeit, Dresden, October 2nd, 1886:

HRH Maria Josepha Luise Philippine Elisabeth Pia Angelica Margarethe Princess of Saxony

* Dresden, May 31st, 1867

 Schlo� Wildenwart, Erlangen, May 28th, 1944

Children from this marriage:

HIM Karl Franz Joseph Ludwig Hubert Georg Otto Maria Emperor of Austria, King of Hungary and Bohemia

HI & RH Maximilian Eugen Ludwig Friedrich Philipp Ignatius Joseph Maria Prince Imperial and Archduke of Austria, Prince Royal of Hungary and Bohemia

HIM Karl Franz Joseph Ludwig Hubert Georg Otto Maria Emperor of Austria, King of Hungary and Bohemia

(Born as: HI & RH Karl Franz Joseph Ludwig Hubert Georg Otto Maria Prince Imperial and Archduke of Austria, Prince Royal of Hungary and Bohemia)

(Since October 31st, 1914:) HI & RH Karl Franz Joseph Ludwig Hubert Georg Otto Maria Prince Imperial and Archduke of Austria-Este, Prince Royal of Hungary and Bohemia

* Schlo� Persenbeug near Ybbs an der Donau, Lower Austria, August 17th, 1887

 Villa Quinta do Monte, Funchal, Madeira, April 1st, 1922

Heir Pressumptive to the Throne of Austria-Hungary, June 28th, 1914; created Archduke of Austria-Este, October 31st, 1914

Emperor of Austria, King of Hungary and Bohemia, King of Lombardia-Venice, King of Illyria, Grand Duke of Cracow, Duke of Salzburg, Duke of Ragusa and Zara, Prince of Triente and Brixen, Duke of Friaul, Lord of Cattaro, November 21st, 1916 (abdicated as Emperor of Austria: Vienna, November 10th, 1918; deposed as King of Bohemia: November 11th, 1918; deposed as King of Hungary: November 3rd, 1921)

Married:

Kapelle des Heiligen Heinrich, Schwarzau am Steinfelde, October 21st, 1911:

HRH Zita Maria delle Grazie Adelgonda Micaela Raffaela Gabriella Giuseppina Antonia Luisa Agnese Princess of Bourbon-Parma

* Villa Reale delle Pianore near Viareggio, Lucca, May 9th, 1892

 Sankt Johannes Stift, Zizers near Chur, March 14th, 1989

Children from this marriage:

HI & RH Franz Joseph Otto Robert Maria Anton Karl Max Heinrich Sixtus Xaver Felix Renatus Ludwig Gaetan Pius Ignatius Prince Imperial and Archduke of Austria, Prince Royal of Hungary and Bohemia

 P�cking, October 2nd, 1971

 Munich, July 23rd, 1989

Married:

(civil) P�cking, July 21st and (religious) P�cking, July 25th, 1956:

HH Georg Alexander Michael Friedrich Wilhelm Albert Theodor Franz Duke von Mecklenburg

(Born as: Georg Alexander Michael Friedrich Wilhelm Albert Theodor Franz Count von Carlow)

(Since July 18th, 1929:) HSH Georg Alexander Michael Friedrich Wilhelm Albert Theodor Franz Duke von Mecklenburg

* Oranienbaum, Russia, October 4th, 1899

 Sigmaringen, July 6th, 1962

Assumed the title Duke von Mecklenburg (confirmed with the style Serene Highness by HIH Grand Duke Kyril of Russia: July 18th, 1929; and confirmed with the style Highness by the HRH Hereditary Grand Duke Friedrich Franz von Mecklenburg-Schwerin: December 18th, 1950)

HI & RH Elisabeth Charlotte Alphonsa Christina Theresia Antonia Josepha Roberta Ottonia Franziska Isabella Pia Marcus d'Aviano et omnes sancti Princess Imperial and Archduchess of Austria, Princess Royal of Hungary and Bohemia

* (posthumously) El Pardo, May 31st, 1922

 Graz, January 7th, 1993

Married:

HSH Heinrich Karl Vincenz Maria Benediktus Justinus Prince von und zu Liechtenstein

 April 17th, 1991

* Villa Wartholz near Reichenau an der Rax, November 20th, 1912

Heir to the Throne of Austria-Hungary, November 21st, 1916

Head of the Imperial and Royal Family of Austria-Hungary, April 1st, 1922
